EmailTemplate.name: Claim Email Reply Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation notification for ({Case.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {!Claimant}, Thank you for your timely response to our request. You have responded that the wage claim submitted on your behalf by {!advocate/rep} against {!Defendant} on {!filed date} is to be CONFIRMED. Your case number is . Your claim is assigned to the following Wage Office: {!DIR_Case__c.Office__c } {!DIR_Case__c.DIR_WCA_Office_Address__c} {!DIR_Case__c.DIR_Office_Phone_Number__c} Labor Commissioner's Office
